text: @GavinNewsom There is overwhelming evidence from many peer reviewed studies that corroborate the mortality risk from COVID-19 is very low (0.1 – 03%) and in line with other respiratory diseases such as the seasonal flu.  The risk level to average citizen is not significantly greater than it
